short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for authorised MediaFerry users to manage their projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension allows authorised MediaFerry users to track the progress of their creative requests using a pop-up based chat interface. If you're a MediaFerry user and unable to use this extension then please contact us at hello@mediaferry.com.
